column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Only stayed BC my companion had so looked forward to it. Service was o.k. Chocolate chip cookies and desert ingredients were top quality. Melon/cucumber gazpacho was just descent. Went there hoping for a full meal
column2: but not enough vegetarian entree options. They were also out of about half their pastries. I would be happy to support this new bizz and come back to see if they can do better than my these stars
column3: but I would only do that if they were the kind of chefs who thought they could make excellent dishes without using VEAL. It's not that it's meat
column4: it's the type. Please consider ethical practices
column5: and I'll be happy to try you again.
